Version: 2.0

Date: May 2008

License: Creative Commons Attribution-Non-Commercial-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License

Author: JoomlaShine.com

Author URL: www.joomlashine.com

For only US$25 you can purchase JSN Epic PRO which is much more powerful compared with free version. Here is at least 10 benefits you get when buying the PRO version:

  1. 5 more template colors variation
  2. 2 more template fonts combination
  3. More flexible template layout management
  4. Much more advanced template typography
  5. Style adaptation for 5 the most famous extensions
  6. Features for usability & accessibility enhancement
  7. Template graphic source file in .psd format
  8. Brand-free template
  9. Lightning fast support
  10. Downloadable template documentation

JSN Epic PRO is licensed under the commercial proprietary license in 2 options:

  • Single Domain License: You are allowed to use the product only on single domain, belonging to either you or your client. This option is good if you are planning to use JSN Epic PRO only on 1 website / domain.
  • Unlimited Domain License: You are allowed to use the template on unlimited domains, belonging to either you or your client. This option is perfect if you want to deploy JSN Epic PRO to your clients' websites.

You can upgrade from Single Domain License to Unlimited Domain License anytime by paying only the difference in price. Instruction about how to upgrade license can be found in readme.txt file accompanied in download package.

For information about more products, promotions, tutorials and other goodies please visit our website at http://www.joomlashine.com

param.name: templateColor
param.label: PRO - Template Color
param.description: Template color selection.

param.name: templateFont
param.label: PRO - Template Font Style
param.description: Template font selection based on website type.

param.name: logoPath
param.label: Logo Path
param.description: Path to logo image starting from the Joomla! root folder (! without preceding slash !)

param.name: logoWidth
param.label: Logo Wdith (px)
param.description: Logo width specified in pixels

param.name: logoHeight
param.label: Logo Height (px)
param.description: Logo height specified in pixels

param.name: logoLink
param.label: Logo Link
param.description: URL where logo image should link to (! without preceding slash !). Leave this box empty if you want your logo to be clickable.

param.name: logoSlogan
param.label: PRO - Logo Slogan Text
param.description: Slogan text to be attached to the logo image ALT text for SEO purpose

param.name: templateWidth
param.label: Template Width (px or %)
param.description: Overall template width specified in pixels (for fixed width) or percentage (for fluid width)

param.name: leftWidth
param.label: PRO - Left Column Width (%)
param.description: Left column width specified in percentage within range (18% - 33%). Only whole number is allowed, for example 25% - correct, 25.5% - incorrect

param.name: rightWidth
param.label: PRO - Right Column Width (%)
param.description: Right column width specified in percentage within range (18% - 33%). Only whole number is allowed, for example 25% - correct, 25.5% - incorrect

param.name: menuIcons
param.label: PRO - Menu Icons
param.description: Menu icons to be shown in Icon Menu. Please check template documentation for details

param.name: showPathway
param.label: PRO - Show Pathway
param.description: Definition whether to show pathway or not

param.name: enableFontresizer
param.label: PRO - Enable Font Resizer
param.description: Definition whether to show 3 buttons to change font size on toolbar or not

param.name: enableIconLinks
param.label: PRO - Enable Auto Icon links
param.description: Definition whether to enable auto icon link or not. Icons can still be assigned to links by class attribute even if this option is turned off

param.name: enablePNGfix
param.label: Enable PNG Fix for IE6
param.description: Definition whether to enable PNG fix feature for IE6 or not. This parameter should be turned off only when there are incompatibility issues

param.name: enableStyleCB
param.label: PRO - Enable Community Builder Style
param.description: Definition whether to enable additional style for Community Builder. You can turn off this parameter if you want to use specific Community Builder template

param.name: enableStyleDocMan
param.label: PRO - Enable DocMan Style
param.description: Definition whether to enable additional style for DocMan. You can turn off this parameter if you want to use specific DocMan template

param.name: enableStyleVM
param.label: PRO - Enable Virtue Mart Style
param.description: Definition whether to enable additional style for Virtue Mart. You can turn off this parameter if you want to use specific Virtue Mart template

param.name: enableStyleJEvents
param.label: PRO - Enable JEvents Style
param.description: Definition whether to enable additional style for JEvents. You can turn off this parameter if you want to use specific JEvents template

param.name: enableStyleRSG2
param.label: PRO - Enable RSGallery 2 Style
param.description: Definition whether to enable additional style for RSGallery 2. You can turn off this parameter if you want to use specific RSGallery 2 template

param.name: errorReporting
param.label: Error Reporting
param.description: Definition how to display PHP error reporting. This parameter should be used only in template testing cases
